name: Darkness RETRO
description:
Darkness RETRO is a 2d Metroidvania Platformer game made with Unity.

Get rid of the evil forces to save the town. And then do it again. And again. And again.

Controls:

  • Left/Right Arrow: Move
  • Down Arrow: Crouch
  • Up Arrow: Interact
  • C: Attack
  • Space: Jump

The game touches upon the theory of the Eternal Recurrence, as expressed by Friedrich Nietzsche.
